website_summaries.verdict: Instantly lengthen your shape and add edge to your look with an affordable, heeled boot.
pros: The fit adapts to both wide and narrow foot shapes
The interior is lined to keep your legs warm without adding too much in the way of extra fabric
Gives a bit at the top, providing ease of fit for those with athletic thighs
cons: Not the best fit for those with thicker calves

customer_reviews.title: Get these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these boots! I'm usually a size 7.5 in shoes but I read the reviews and ordered an 8.5. They fit perfectly! If you have small calfs like me, these are just what you are looking for! (The dress is also from amazon😉
customer_reviews.author: *Sunshine and Blue birds*

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots! I'm a size 9
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! I'm a size 9, and I went a size up, they fit perfect! Its a wait for delivery, but so worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Flores

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these!! I ordered a size 6 which is my usual size, and they fit my legs perfectly! I get tons of compliments on these when I wear them. I was skeptical because there weren't many reviews or customer submitted photos, but they turned out to be awesome AND at a bargain price. There's even warm, fuzzy faux fur on the lining - an added bonus I wasn't aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Callis

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love, just wish love didn’t keep me waiting
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I ordered a 6.5 even though I’m usually a 5.5-6 and they are great! They fit super snug around the leg but they stretch out so I wouldn’t stress them not being able to fit. The brown color collects endless compliments. The delivery time made me want to pull my hair out, so I’m knocking down a star but besides patience not being my virtue, the actual boots are a slam dunk 5 stars. Not the most superior quality but pretty comfy!
customer_reviews.author: TraSEA

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great style.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow, these boots are exactly what I expected. The fit is perfect and the boots are stretchy enough to stay over the knee. In fact, I am so pleased with my purchase that I am going to get them in another color. BTW, they arrived a few days earlier than expected. I will definitely be wearing these a lot this season. I am an athletic 5' 2" 115lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Family of five

customer_reviews.title: Update 6 months later :(
customer_reviews.text: **Update 6 months later: I have worn these about 15 times and the toes are rubbing off. You can see the inside of the shoe on the end. Cannot wear them now without looking like a slob. It’s a shame because I LOVED these. So hard to find OTK boots for thin legs that actually stay up. **Original post: Love these!!! Exactly what I was looking for after hours upon hours of searching for a quality, reasonably-priced OTK boot!!! For fit comparison, I'm 5'7" and have average/thin legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They weren't the best for walking around for a long time but other ...
customer_reviews.text: They weren't the best for walking around for a long time but other then that I'm in love with these boots the size and where they came up on my thighs was a great fit I was worried because I'm only 5'5 I wasn't disappointed at all ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lynn

customer_reviews.title: The price is amazing for the quality and it fits my legs like ...
customer_reviews.text: Girl..... These are Perfecto!! The price is amazing for the quality and it fits my legs like a glove. Im 5"6 140 lbs medium size leg. If you have thick legs it will not fit Also its not leather, its black suede. My first over the knee boots and Im already thinking about buying more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ernestina

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for with the quality of these boots
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boot in January 2017. By March i noticed a hole had appeared at the front left tip of these boots and another was forming on the right. Its says the return for them closed Feb 21, 2017 so Im left with a product not fit for purpose. I wore these boots about a dozen times. No wonder they were only 45 dollars. You get exactly what you pay for. Other than that they fit really well but are not for people with large calves. Ill be enquiring about getting my money back though.
customer_reviews.author: Crown

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, comfy and SEXY tall boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these boots to wear for my birthday weekend and I absolutely LOVE them!!! They run about a 1/2 size big, so you can wear regular socks and they fit just about right. I wore them one day with jeans and turned around and wore them another day with a skirt. Love them!!! I am 5'8" and I was truly happy to find a boot that truly was a thigh high. It can be harder when you are a little taller. I will note that the boots have almost like a fleece lining so they are sure to keep you warm!
customer_reviews.author: MissCurlyGal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these! Pretty sure they are made for those with skinny calves. I'm grateful for that because I don't love the saggy boot look. I will say that I should NIT have listed to reviews on sizing. I read to order larger..so I ordered a half size up..turns out the size I needed was a half size down from my normal sizing. With these were even just 10.00 cheaper but they feel like great quality so I'm going to assume and hopethattye price will reflect the durability of them. O e last thing..for me the heel was perfect..didn't measure but the heel feels comfortable like a 3 ". At 4" I am officially uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: No more sliding down the legs!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I did a half size up. I generally wear an 8.5, but decided to buy the 9 instead -- I am VERY glad I did. Firstly, the best thing about these boots is that they do NOT slide down. I have owned numerous pairs of over-the-thigh boots, and always had to struggle with tieing them tighter throughout the night or altering them. I do not have that problem with these boots, and my legs are fairly slim (but muscular calves). They fit perfectly, with a bit of stretch to spare. Easy to walk in, comfy and sexy. Even lined with faux fur to keep your legs warm in the winter. :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: High quality, super SEXY Krystal A Fit
customer_reviews.text: Super sexy, i love them enough that i bought multiple colors. Krystal A Fit
customer_reviews.author: Krystal A Fit

customer_reviews.title: These boots were made for walkn
customer_reviews.text: Just give me a pumpkin spice late and stick a fork in me... I'm done and ready for fall now. These are great!!! I want to wear them with everything even wear them to bed while I'm sleeping. I have skinny legs and these actually don't look ridiculous on me!! Dress them up down side ways... I don't care do yourself a favor and treat yoself.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: I wear 8.5 and bought these in size 40
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried when I bought these boots cause everyone said If you don’t have small calves these won’t fit. But it actually hugs your feet and very comfortable! I am 5’4” 133lbs and workout regularly so I have normal calves lol Ao happy I bought these! They stay up all day as well. Has zipper on the inner legs. If you are worried just buy it! Sooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Natsuki Jameson

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed is NOT leather at all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red “leather” boots .. So disappointed is NOT leather at all.. instead very cheap material. Shipment took forever...just got them today 🙈I’m returning this boots. So cheap looking boots DISAPPOINTED 😔
customer_reviews.author: Utsukushi

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the boots! I did have to stretch them a tiny bit, using my hands, nothing special. Also, not much cushion on the soles. The balls of my feet hurt immediately upon putting the boots on.. and for a week after wearing them for two hours. And since they are lined inside, I couldn't stick my usual feet cushions in. I got a pair of metatarsal sleeve pads with gel cushion and the issue is now resolved. I like that the boots are warm and soft inside. Overall, great boots, but get some gel cushion sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Skinny Legs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I normally wear an 8 1/2 and so ordered a 9 to allow for the pointy toe giving me room to wiggle my toes. The other reviewers were correct in that these boots are perfect for skinny legs. I normally can't find boots that aren't flapping on my calves. These fit like a glove, perfectly smooth all the way up my thigh. I originally thought that I could wear these over my skinny jeans but don't think that is possible as they fit like a second skin. Haven't worn them out yet so I cannot comment on long wearing comfort but they feel great walking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: MaR

customer_reviews.title: For Thin legs!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 39, I typically wear an 8 in women's shoes. My calf circumference is 13.25" at it's widest point and the boots are tight. There is no stretch to this boot, so if your calf is any bigger than that they just won't work. The heel height is comfortable for walking. They do smell a little bit so I'm hoping that putting them outside for a bit clears that up. All in all I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed will not purchase from them again
customer_reviews.text: Product runs extremely small, does not stretch to accomdate the average calf, returning the boot cost me $15 postage, Shoe and Tale Does not pay for return postage. I'm very disappointed will not purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love. I have been on the market for thigh ...
customer_reviews.text: Love. I have been on the market for thigh high boots forever but didn’t want them to slide and fall. I’m a size 8/10 women’s pant. I pulled them out of the box and thought no way will I fit. But they did. I can tell they feel so secure. The heel height is easy to wear. These will not fall. Maybe if you’re like a zero or two. Definitely have some stretch. I hope the elasticity lasts a lifetime. That would be a bummer. I’m a size nine foot and it’s true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hannar

customer_reviews.title: made for women with chicken legs
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review as a woman with chicken legs. THANK YOU for making these! I absolutely DREAD buying thigh high boots because they never sit right on me. They're always either too loose by the thigh area that they fall off during the night or the calf area is too baggy. I originally got these for an Ariana Grande Halloween costume and then I fell in love with the shoes and wear them every time I go out! They are not my comfiest shoes, but they are my most comfortable high heeled shoes (which was a surprise given their height and heel width). I can go all night wearing them without taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: avouka2

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, though don’t expect quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots knowing they specifically fit best on small calves. I can almost never find boots snug enough to hug my calves. These fit really well, though i imagine with jeans on it might be more difficult to get on. They are a really lovely faux-suede with a thick lining for warmth and are surprisingly comfortable. My one gripe is that the package was originally estimated to arrive Oct. 12 and shipped without tracking information. I didn’t receive my item until November 1st. Customer service was very response however, and did offer tracking information the second time I contacted them to check on shipping status.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A.

customer_reviews.title: Very sexy boots
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boot first off. I see similar styles at forever21 and Charlotte Russe but they look cheap. Great quality for the price! I am 5'10", thin, but muscular. I was worried my calves wouldn't fit, but I can fit them in. They don't stretch so much. They also don't go over my knee, just at the middle of my knee, but they still look good. I purchased thigh high stockings from forever21 to help with the thigh high part. These are easy to walk in. Very sexy boots
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots look and feel amazing! The tie up on the back helps keep it in place and adds a nice detail. It's pretty true to size, but it seems like it's uncomfortably small on my right foot. The left fits perfectly. I'm a 6.5. Breaking them in may help with stretching them out a little. The heel height is just enough that it's not painful to walk in. Would recommend to buy! Go up a half size if you have wide feet like me.
customer_reviews.author: Becc

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots but they are snug in circumference
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but they are snug in circumference. The shoe size and tallness was perfect. I usually wear normal calf boots and have never needed wide calf. These boots are so snug that I cannot where they over jeans or any material other than stockings. They are so cute though so I couldn't bring myself to return them since they fit well in every other way.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes if you have pencil legs.
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't be SO bad if the top was stretchy, but my wife couldn't get the shoes over her knees, there was zero stretch. She has what I would consider runners legs, so not model pencil legs which you need for these, but an athletic build. Apart from that the shoes were REALLY nice, soft suede, fur inside, would have looked good if they'd have fitted her, but now I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Broken heel after 3 wears
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these 3 times. The fourth time I wore them (yesterday) the heel on one shoe broke off within 10 minutes of wearing. They are completely broken and unwearable now. I’m very sad, as these fit great and were comfortable the several times I wore them. I would expect shoes costing this much to last more than 3 wears though. Edit: Moved from 1 star to 3 because, while the shoes still broke, customer service was very responsive and very accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I am 5'4" 118lbs and these boots fit me perfectly snug. If you have athletic legs or large calves then these probably will not fit. They were not prime shipping when I bought them and took about 3 weeks to get. The company was quick to respond and very polite when I emailed them with shipping questions. These boots are a great buy! I'll probably order another pair in the grey!
customer_reviews.author: Megaruno

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots for Slender Legs
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit so well and looked so pretty that I bought another pair right away! Have 'em in PU and Suede, both black. As a size 7 it fits me true to size. It's comfortable enough for casual wear, but I don't recommend Amusement Parks or long hikes. These look sleek and very pretty. They look high but don't feel too high.
customer_reviews.author: Nan R.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. I was initially so in love with these boots, I bought them because my last pair kept falling down as they stretched out (I have skinny legs) and all the reviews mentioned how tight fitting these are. The are furry inside which makes them really warm (major sweaty feet) However I've had them less than two months and wearing them in the rain has ruined them. The shoe started pulling away at the sole so now the is a hole on the bottom and my toes are all wet.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN HEEL
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots twice and the third time I tried to wear them, they broke before I made it out the door causing me to injure myself. Seller won't refund or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE boot
customer_reviews.text: Sexy yet can be professional look or just what you need to MAKE your entire outfit of the day. Can wear with anything. Great from this time of year with oversized sweater and these boots or a slim fit dress to add that extra spice :) shoes are pointed so order maybe a size up depending on your feet/toes. This is the IN look right now. Highly suggest and great customer service :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexy boots!
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice on and stay up on my thighs. I got the camel color in the micro suede and the boots actually look more expensive than they are. I am normally an 8-8.5 shoe but go up to 9 for boots. These are very big in the actual foot area; length and width (and I have very wide feet). My only issue is that they fit SUPER snuggly in the calf and leg area. I have thick thighs, but my calves are pretty normal. It’s a weird fit, but nevertheless I’m keeping and just wearing with thick socks and possibly an insole for better cushioning and support. If you have large calves and thighs, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Greenboudoir

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots! I was a little bit worried about sizing based on the reviews but these boots are definitely true to size, even with the fur inside (the fur doesn't go all the way up the leg btw). I ordered my normal size (8.5) and they fit like a glove. I am 5'8" and they went up to the top of my knee. The pictures make the heel look a little weird, like it is awkwardly slanted, but it's not at all. Perfect heel height! They seem to be well made too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, look but just one minor defect.
customer_reviews.text: Boot look great, I would say great quality for the price. I finally found boots that fit my legs, I have slim legs and had problem to find boots that would hug over the knee area. This are perfect. The only downside is that one boot seems 1 cm longer than another. It’s not very noticeable and I think I can live with it, don’t want to go through return and buy again process. If not this minor defect that would be solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Best above the knee boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are everything. I have the skinniest legs and I never thought I would find boots that actual fit my legs. They fit perfectly. I can't wait until the weather gets colder to debut these bad boys. I normally wear a size 8 and that is the size I purchased. They fit just perfectlywithout socks but if I could I would have gone up a half size because I like to wear socks inside my boots. If you have have skinny legs like me these boots are for you. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Bukks

customer_reviews.title: If you have slim legs this is the perfect pair of boots for you
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made, elegant and sexy looking pair of boots. If you have slim legs this is the perfect pair of boots for you! Would definitely recommend. Great price for great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a LITTLE bit large
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a woman’s size 7. And all the 7’s were sold out, so I took a chance and ordered the 6.5’s and they fit perfect. I have skinny legs and these actually fit my legs. Great heels!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy now! Amazing boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that these boot exceeded all my expectations!! They are amazing!! For the price the quality is good. They are comfortable . With the heel not being too tall or too short. They for my legs perfectly and actually make them look thinner! I could t believe how much I like them! I am thinking of getting another pair in another color. Just for reference I am 5’3 and 150 pounds. I have average size legs . I thought these boots would not fit up my leg ... I was so wrong! They fit like a glove !! Buy these boots. You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I am IN LOVE with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE with these boots! They fit as expected and are very snug on my leg. They stay up! I only have to adjust them a little when i get back up from sitting. They are very tight on your leg. I'm 5'10" 155 lbs and there is no room to spare at my knee. I could not wear them over leggings or jeans... but that's not what i bought them for anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Reddragon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fitting boots I’ve EVER found for my skinny calves!! I am so excited!! They won’t work for anyone who typically fits into boots, but amazing for my fellow bird-leggers. 🐦 🤪 Great quality and beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Linn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boots
customer_reviews.text: these boots are amazing!!!!!! i’m a size 9 normally but have wide feet so i ordered a 10, i did not need to do this as they have enough width! these boots are so comfortable and fit perfectly around my legs. if you are over a size 8 pants or have big thighs/knees/calves they will not fit because the shaft is pretty narrow. i’m 5’5 with long legs and they come just above my knees. super cute and perfect to dress any outfit up. I love these boots and cannot recommend them enough
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: If you have very skinny legs these will be perfect for you
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review before but I had to for these. They are TIGHT. If you have very skinny legs these will be perfect for you. If you have average size calfs do not buy these. They are so hard to get on because of the "fur" on the inside. I can only wear them with a dress. They will not fit over any pants. They're very hard to get on. Once they're on I like them but they're very snug, and I wouldn't consider my legs to be very big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR SLIM LEGS... order half size down.
customer_reviews.text: Upside: They are fur-lined! They are super warm and very well made. I have chopsticks for legs and they fit snugly without looking like I was wearing Olive Oil’s goulashes. Downside: I am a 6.5 and these were too big. Order a half size down for a true fit. Also, the boots come to just above the knees not mid thigh like the picture. Don’t even think about wearing them with jeans. Leggings and Stockings only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤💜💙💚💛♥
customer_reviews.text: I am a very petite (xxs/xs or 00/0) and I always find it hard to find a perfect clothing for me especially (knee high)..and this his is by far the best boots I've ever owned. Fits me perfectly and comfy. It's very warm n the inside and very well made. I'd recommend this to anyone who likes knee high tight boots. It is a very lovely boots. I'm thinking of getting the different color😊
customer_reviews.author: Anielyn Moreira

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Solid Boots . I love these boots. I was worried that they wouldn’t be sturdy or comfy . Get them !!! I have issues with heels not being comfortable . I was able to wear these for hours with no issues.8 wish the zipper was at the back of the boot .
customer_reviews.author: Winner 87

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived it came in such a small box I didn’t think it was shoes. They came nicely packaged I’d say. It wasn’t bad. But looked a little cheap. I was really disappointed bc it’s like a sock. There’s no structure to the shoe. Would make it very hard to walk in and looks lumpy around the foot
customer_reviews.author: adrianne gvozdanovic

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfy, probably not durable
customer_reviews.text: These are not expensive boots and I do not expect them to last. However, they look great, feel great, and are holding up after a half-dozen wearings which is more than I expected. Surprisingly comfortable. I like the half zip (on the inside calf), although the other colors do not seem to have the zipper. The suede is soft and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: they are awesome looking and extra comfy
customer_reviews.text: okay first of all,these are not made of leather. they're some sort of synthetic stretchy fabric. secondly if you have fat thighs or calves forget these. thirdly if they fit, they are awesome looking and extra comfy. the feet area is big so feel free to add extra socks or insoles. good toe room for extra wiggly toes. they dont fall down at all dude to how snugly they fit my legs.
customer_reviews.author: stiff

customer_reviews.title: I have super long skinny legs and these were a bit on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have super long skinny legs and these were a bit on the tight side and made my ankle uncomfortable. Getting them off was a challenge, but the most disappointing thing about these boots was the fact that they have a cheap hallow plastic heel. I should have known since they were from China, every time I buy boots or heels from China they ALWAYS have that cheap hallow heel. So tacky and cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Nava

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THIN LEGS
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO EXCITED. Thank God I found these boots. I have thin legs and no over the knee boots ever look tight on me or stay up. But these beauties are perfect! They look so expensive and nice. I’m telling you. BUY THESE. If you don’t have really thin legs tho these prolly won’t fit you...
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet or big calves
customer_reviews.text: This boots is definitely not for wide feet. I'm a size 6 and I have a wide feet. So I ordered size 6 and it a snug fit on my the calves, but its tight on my feet because the boots is slim fit and not for wide fit. It's my fault for not ordering size 6.5 or 7. Definitely if you have a wide feet, order 1 size up. Good side is the material of the boots outside is nice and easy to clean and the inside has a velvet lining.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoann

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 9. 5, which is ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5, which is what I ordered....the bottom of the boots says 41 (which converts to 9.5 American). However, when I tried to put them on I couldn't. They were so small I couldn't even get my foot in. I held these boots up sole to sole with another pair of my shoes and they were half the size! These boots could NOT be more than a size 7 NO MATTER what they say. Complete joke. These are getting returned ASAP!! Save your money and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget Combs

customer_reviews.title: These boots are beautiful and fit my feet like a glove and i ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful and fit my feet like a glove and i have wide feet. But i have to say you need to have very skinny legs because they are very tight and i had to peel them off and i have skinny legs. It's usually hard for me to find boots that are tight around my skinny calves because they usually just fall down. But wow they are tight... You need to break them in but other than being sooo tigh,t they are beautiful and sexy
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I wear a size 5-1/2. Went up to size 6. Great fit! Love the light pile lining. Still able to wear a thin sock for extra warmth. Enough stretch to wear over skinny jeans or just bare legs. My calf, 11-3/4" and thigh, 14". Height, 5' 2". Weight 105 lbs. If you have a fuller foot or fluffy leg best to size up. Maybe contact seller to clarify. Great customer service. Always responded in less than 24 hours, even over the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Snuggiest, over-the-knee, perfect height, heeled boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a heeled over the knee boots for sooo long and I found them! These boots are the perfect height, calf fit, and with quality! The insulation on the calf makes it even better!! I'm a regular 8 (for most shoe brands) but a 38 (which I think is a 7.5?) fits just fine! I might have to wear an ankle sock with the shoe to help with slippage and a snuggier feet fit, but other than that, this pair is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: I have black and grey!
customer_reviews.text: I am over 40 and still like to keep my look fashionable and sexy. Every time I wear the grey I get compliments. Tunic, leggings, skinny jeans, sweater dress. so many fun looks with these hot booties!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Krietzburg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Hey girls, these boots are awesome.. I ordered size 7 and is damn true to size.. I was a little afraid that it would be a little bigger.. But notttt at all, big enough to wear your socks and wont be tight tight. Its very comfortable.. They fit perfectly fine. Im size 7.. If you are size 7 and around 125 lbs.. Dont order 7.5. Its gunne ne toooo big..
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have smaller calves and boots usually don’t stay up well on me. These were a good find. Very comfortable. I wore them to a party and stood comfortably in them all day. Even walked back and fourth across the street to a restaurant in the city with ease !
customer_reviews.author: Mamiana

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Sexy
customer_reviews.text: These boots a little tight in the legs, but still very cute and sexy! They are just as cute on as they are in the picture, but it's the best quality material in the shoe/sole part. The stretchy material in the leg is actually warm and form fitting and is super cute. However, because the shoe/ soles are NOT the best quality, you can't wear them for hours without it taking toll on your feet. Still, for the inexpensive price, it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Big in the foot and small on the thigh.
customer_reviews.text: Look good but I returned so can’t speak to how they wear. The foot is somewhat bigger than the size indicated (by 1/2) and the toe is tight. Despite this, the top fits tightly and could barely fit over my bare thigh. Don’t know how others wore these work jeans or other material.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit - great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8.5 in boots, and ordered these in a size 9. They are snug around the ankle and leg (I have very skinny calves) but the actually shoe fits, so I will keep them. Ideally I would like a larger shaft because the fabric bunches a little at the ankles, but these are great nonetheless. The quality is great and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ali D.

customer_reviews.title: Boots are Suede not Leather
customer_reviews.text: This item is incorrectly described as stretchy leather. The boots I received were suede. Had I known the boots were suede and not leather I would not have purchased them. I needed leather boots for a specific event and now I don’t have time to find the appropriate boots in time for my event. This is beyond disappointing. It’s false. The correct description of the boots needs to be listed or the correct style of boot needs to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skinny legged women only. Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute but it is Asian sizing. Although my legs are long and slender I am not able to wear jeans with them. It’s a tight squeeze pulling them up. But once they are on they are very cute and stay up. Do not order if your legs aren’t slender. Takes a long time to get them too
customer_reviews.author: AM_Mama89

customer_reviews.title: 5 easily. I was actually kinda shocked how tight the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly sure how to write this review. I am a true 6.5 always a 6.5 for steve madden shoes. I bought a 6 and could have gotten a 5.5 easily. I was actually kinda shocked how tight the legs were as I have small calfs. They do seem like they will stretch out so I will update my review in a few weeks. They do look very nice and seem comfortable​.
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Not leather, but cute boot
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all a leather boot as described. This isn't a problem for the boot, but I am not a fan of the false advertising. It is 100% man made materials. That said, it's a boot you'd expect to get for the price in the US. It fit me, I'm 5 foot 3, 130lbs with bigger thighs. It's more like a high heel with a sock attached. Very cute as a boot and has some warmth added. <4 stars for the claim it's "leather".
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for petite skinny legs!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but this is for all the girls with skinny legs who can never find over the knee boots that fit. For reference I am 5’3” 100lbs and these boots are PERFECT. No gapping in the calf or thigh, they aren’t too high for my stature either. I also love that the heels look high but don’t feel it when you are walking. These are amazing for the price, I just bought in tan too, just wish it had prime shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Botti

customer_reviews.title: 😍in love😍
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G😍 These are PERFECT! I have skinny legs and I have never in my life had a pair of boots that fit so perfectly around my legs! All my skinny leg girls out there, JUST BUY THEM! Trust me! You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonoholic

customer_reviews.title: I really like these.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these... they don't fall down my thigh and they fit me perfectly. I wouldn't say they are all that comfortable but I feel like that's normal for most heels... I got some inserts and they help a lot. I haven't worn them for a long period of time yet so I hope they hold up quality wise. If they do then I give these 5 stars for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jobanana

customer_reviews.title: Great little boots!
customer_reviews.text: Just the cutest boots ever! Better than more expensive boots that I have seen. They won’t fit on someone with larger legs though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute boot and didn't look cheap, but the calves were definitely too small. I wear an 8 1/2 medium in most boots which is what I ordered. I have average calves (14" at the widest spot), and I could barely zip them up. They were so tight, I couldn't pull them all the way up, and they were bunchy around the calves. Had to send them back!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Wear with quality gel insoles
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have slender calves and never thought I'd find thigh highs that actually fit my thighs!! Definitely sexy. I'm giving four stars only because these have ZERO arch support. I actually had purchased them in my true size: 8.5 but bought some quality gel insoles from Target and exchanged the boots for a half size up, 9. Worth it! This is how I'm buying heels from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Rose

customer_reviews.title: The price of sexy.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved them but said they are def not meant for long walks around town. Feet hurt after a couple of hours. Said it was mostly due to the pin point heal so I'm not sure if its the shoe or her ability to walk on a tiny heal point. Either way, she looks super sexy in them so its a win in my book :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebel1280

customer_reviews.title: etc} but these were super tight to pull on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a boot that said LEATHER so I was expecting a shiny finish? These are almost velvety. Not what I ordered. Aldo they are not nearly as high as pictured, just barely over the knee. I wear a 7 in all shoe types {tennis, cowboy boots, dressy boots, heels, etc} but these were super tight to pull on. I have boots similar to this and I by no means have thick calves or thighs!
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Kassandra Spanier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So my wife put these on with a pair of leggings and loved them. They look great, and she says they are warm and comfortable. I'll show my man card, I think they look great too... A winner for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boot (
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots and got so many compliments. I have muscular legs and they fit my calf perfectly. May be difficult to wear with jeans (Too tight). They do not fall down like some thigh high boots can which is such a plus! You’ll be more than happy with these boots. Love
customer_reviews.author: Dog and shop non stop

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are cute but has no support for your arch sooo sad because I could only wear them for 15 min. On Christmas!! But I might get some inserts see if that works if not I'll just sell them or something lol!
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Abarca perez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This boots are great! They are true to size. I ordered a size up based on the reviews but runs true to size. They are perfect for skinny legs, they stay up. The suede is not real but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay l

customer_reviews.title: Okay boot
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect! The only issue I had was the separation of the entire boot. The bottom portion looks like a regular heel and fabric was sewn on to it to make it a knee higher boot. Cut if you don’t care about the separation. It bother me so I returned them. Quality is okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Look good - but doesn’t fit my calf muscle:/
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love these but I have more of athletic build and it was too tight on my calfs. I wear size 8 and ordered a size 9 so def go a size up. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Cute, up go up half a size if you have "normal" legs ;)
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9 but the shaft barely fit over my leg. I want to wear these over jeans so I'm re-ordering in half a size up. (btw- I'm 5'6" 138lb pear shape with thick thighs.) Boot is sexy and cute. Total steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Aranyi

customer_reviews.title: The zipper ripped
customer_reviews.text: The zipper ripped the first time we put them on. I would send them back, but I need them for a theater production. They came from China, and there's no way a new pair would come in time. They took several weeks to come originally. They fit fine, the legs are pretty narrow, but they are okay. Definitely not good quality, but I didn't expect great things for $45. But the zipper shouldn't tear on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Marsoun

customer_reviews.title: THESE DONT RUN SMALL, THEY ARE TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Do not listen to reviews these run true to size. I ordered a half of a size larger and they were to big. I had to return them. Very said they are super cute but don’t have a replacement in my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Small in the calves
customer_reviews.text: Fits small in the calf. Not recommended if you work out or have larger cabins/angle fit small in the calf. Not recommended if you work out or have larger calves/ankles
customer_reviews.author: Indira

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, Comfy, & Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable shoes. Love the look and feel. It’s very versatile and fits for most occasions. I’m 5’1” and 110lbs and got 6 and the soul fits comfortably. It’s slightly tight on the calf area with leggings on. I’m sure it just needs breaking in. Would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ngan T.

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Boots for Slim Thick Women
customer_reviews.text: Sexy Boots, perfect for my small legs. Normally boots fall down but these stay up. If you have big legs this is not for you, but to all my slim thick 😂 like me this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Not good for nice calves.
customer_reviews.text: If you have skinny calves these are fine. I have very muscular legs and these would not pull up over them at all. I also don’t like the tan color of the bottom. Not a good look. I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lamonica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Recipient Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my very picky teenage grand daughter and she is in love with them. She has been bragging and posting a great many pictures of her wearing them and is getting tons of compliments. I would say this purchase was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Petalblush

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t fit over my calves
customer_reviews.text: If you have any calf muscles at all I would recommend NOT purchasing these. Im 5’1 115 lbs with average calfs and these boots would not budge past mid calf. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Real

customer_reviews.title: Good for skinny legs
customer_reviews.text: Soft boots. Need to get a half size bigger so i can fit some cushion inside. They are cute for cheap boots. Very soft.. i am skinny 5'9 and they barely cover my knees. Good for skinny legs.. ordered 9 (euro 40) but figured i need 9.5 so my toes can be comfy..

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to know
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these boots! They fit perfectly I usually wear a size 10 and got a size 10 (43) and it fit perfectly. I was worried about it actually going over my knee since I’m 5”10 but the boot actually goes above my knee a few inches so I was super happy! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because they are a little difficult to take off if you don’t wear stockings or socks because the material inside. I have average sized calves and they fit snug but not too snug so if you have huge calves this boot might not fit you.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Calf boots, NOT thigh high
customer_reviews.text: These are not thigh high boots. They are barely over the knee boots. Very disappointing. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve order this boot with hopes it runs REALLY small or is cheaply made. Nope it’s just not for me, I’m 5’4 and extremely muscular can’t get the boots over my knees. I’m a size 9 order the 10 then went ahead and ordered the 10.5 sending them both back highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy lining and decent arch support
customer_reviews.text: So fit as expected. I was pleasantly surprised there is a soft fuzzy lining in the leg portion. Arch isnt too high so while I dont usually wear heels this shoe feels like it wont actually be that uncomfortable for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You can bring sexy back with this boots
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of boots ( I may have a little boot addiction ) and this one is my most favorite. They are very comfortable and soft and I’m eyeing this boot in another color to buy 😂
customer_reviews.author: Not Sorry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! 💴 I had looked EVERYWHERE for a pair of boots for my skinny legs and finally resorted to Amazon and took a chance. Comfortable and very sexy and I’m very happy with this purchase. The only caveat is that it’s shipped from China, so I had to wait 3 weeks for it to arrive. But that was not a problem for me. Thank you Shoe n Tale!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian B.

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these boots. After my first wear the inside shoe pad rolled up and i was being stabbed by metal in heel. No way to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not work at ALL for curvy/athletic legs.
customer_reviews.text: Really great color and fit from these boots. The purple color is fantastic! The boot shaft (as earlier stated by other Reviewers) is quite narrow and absolutely perfect for skinny legs. I ordered the 9.5 and it fix wonderfully. So excited that these came today and I am even more excited to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Ella H.

customer_reviews.title: Sole tear off after only 3 times wear
customer_reviews.text: I really really loved this shoe. It was everything i needed but was very disappointed when after wearing it only 3times the glue on front of the sole fade off that i cant even wear it anymore . Am soooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

product_meta.title: Shoe'N Tale Women Over The Knee High Stretchy Leather Thigh high Snow Boots
feature_bullets: Black PU and Red PU are Leather ,others are Faux Suede, please check carefully
Manmade Sole,Over the knee high Winter Boots Fur inside
Made with a full elasticated leg for most shape calf fitting as possible.
Due to take in light and the monitor, pictures may have a slight chromatism problem.
